Bash(wsl -d Ubuntu -e bash -c "cd /mnt/c/stackbill/Course/Node-red/vibe-code/stackwatch && git push origin main")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add one-liner installer for StackWatch

- Create install.sh for curl | bash installation \(like Helm\)
- Support --version flag for beta/latest/specific versions
- Support --install-dir flag for custom installation path
- Update nginx config to serve install.sh with text/plain content type
- Update download page with Quick Install section
- Update setup script to deploy install.sh to artifact server

Usage: curl -fsSL https://artifact.stackwatch.io/install.sh | sudo bash

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix release workflow: beta builds from source, latest promotes beta

- beta: Builds fresh from source code, deploys to /beta/ folder
- latest: Promotes current beta to /latest/ \(no rebuild, just copy\)
- Archives old latest to /archive/ before promotion
- Fails if no beta exists when trying to promote

Proper workflow:
1. Run pipeline with ''beta'' to build and test
2. Run pipeline with ''latest'' to promote tested beta

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
